review: Bought this to replace an xbox that crashed because we only use it to watch Netflix and Amazon Prime movies. It didn't work from the start. Any movies that I tried to stream gave me a blue screen with the words "HDCP unauthorized content disabled" on it. I tried the unplugging and re plugging it back in that is recommended and that also didn't work.  I contacted Amazon Support who were patient and walked me through the process of trying to get it to work, by doing a factory reset, and that didn't work either. They did offer to replace the Fire TV Stick, however, I didn't want to get another one to have it not work from the start. I am taking this back to the store.
author: Kendra C. Wageman
